definition: loud sound, such as that of thunder or a bomb/to rumble/to roar
echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises

sentences.english: WHEN storm clouds rumble in the sky and June showers come down.
sentences.chinese: 當雷雲在天上轟響，六月的陣雨落下的時候。

sentences.english: In this part of the cave, they could hear an insistent booming sound.
sentences.chinese: 在洞穴的這塊地方，他們能夠聽到持續的轟響。

sentences.english: Thunder rolled just above his head.
The astronauts heard a loud noise.
sentences.chinese: 宇航員聽到一聲震耳的轟響。
大炮發出短促清脆的轟響。

sentences.english: We heard a boom in the distance as the bomb went off.
sentences.chinese: 我們聽見遠處一聲轟響，像是爆炸一樣。

sentences.english: The breakers ran down the shore in long, hoarse strokes.
sentences.chinese: 激浪拍打着海岸，發出長長的，低渾的轟響。

sentences.english: And when this happens, when we allow freedom ring.
sentences.chinese: 當我們讓自由之聲轟響。

sentences.english: The breakers4 ran down the shore in long, hoarse strokes.
sentences.chinese: 激浪拍打着海岸，發出長長的，低渾的轟響。
